TextView.android:text: MARS- The Forth Planet from the Sun

Basic Information:
Type: Terrestrial planet
Order from Sun: 4th planet
Distance from Sun: ~227.94 million km (~1.52 AU)
Diameter: 6,779 km
Mass: ~6.417 × 10^23 kg (about 10.7% of Earth's mass)
Gravity: 3.71 m/s² (about 38% of Earth's gravity)

Orbital And Rotational Characteristics:
Revolution period (around Sun): 687 Earth days
Rotation period (on its own axis): 24.6 hours
Orbital Speed: 24.077 km/s
Axial Tilt: ~25.19° (has seasons similar to Earth)
Orbital Eccentricity: 0.0934

Moons And Rings:
Number of Moons: 2 (Phobos and Deimos)
Number of Rings: 0

Surface And Atmosphere:
Surface Temperature:
Day: Up to 20°C (68°F)
Night: Down to -125°C (-195°F)
Surface Composition: Rocky, covered with iron oxide (rust), giving it a reddish color
Atmosphere Type: Thin
Main Gases in Atmosphere: Carbon Dioxide (CO₂), Nitrogen (N₂), Argon (Ar)
Weather Conditions: Dust storms, thin atmosphere, low air pressure
